name: Keep it (on) Alive
description:
Controls:
Skip Tutorial - z
Movement - Arrow Keys
Change Character - z
Reset Level - s

There comes a time in every programmer's life when she/he has to make all the art herself/himself. This is Keep it (on) Alive where the objectives are simple:

(Keep (it) alive[green] , But keep (that) dead[red]) && ( (it) and (alive) on (Here)[Blue])

Got that? Me neither. But you learn fast!
To make it even more simpler, let me introduce a new tile: The SWAP[white]'
Remember the objectives? When you SWAP is pressed down, just swap (that) and (it)
Got that? Of course, maybe!

Also feel free to check out a game I helped make: Monsieur Le Maire
